|brand = WatchGuard |model = Firebox Edge XTM 22 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = XP3E6 |page_start_date = 02/01/2021‎ |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/WatchGuard_Firebox_Edge_XTM_22 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = security appliance |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = Q6G-XP3E6W |icid = 4657A-XP3E6W |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = YM100C-1.6mm |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Intel XScale;IXP435; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = XScale |cpu1spd = 667 <!-- 400 / 533 / 667 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;K9F2G08U0B-PCB0; |flash1size = 256 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Macronix;MX29LV800CTTC-70G; |flash2size = 1 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = Samsung;K4T51163QG-HCE6; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E6060; |eth3chip = Realtek;RTL8366SR; |wan_ports = 3 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 3 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:90:7F
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = Redboot;2.04;WatchGuard; |stockos = Linux;2.6.21.7;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.5 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1), |jtag = yes,, 20-pin header,, unpopulated,, CON1,
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = RTC w/ battery backup, heatsink, |addchip = 2-Wire RTC IC;Seiko;S35390A;;1;,,, Dual Operational Amplifier;Texas Instruments;LM358;;1;,,, 1.5A/3A Bus Termination Regulator;Advanced Power;AP1250GM;;1;,,, 5.3A, 30V P-Channel Power MOSFET;Silicon Standard;SSM9435GM;;2;,,, 800ma Low Dropout Linear Regulator;National Semiconductor;LM1117;;2;,,, Positive Edge-triggered 3-State Octal D-type Flip-Flop;NXP;74HC374N;;1;,,, Quadruple 2-Input Positive-OR Gate;Texas Instruments;SN74LVC32A;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = 10.0.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = readwrite |manuf = SerComm |manuf_model = YM100C-1.6mm |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = EoL |eoldate = 06/30/2017 |fccapprovdate = 10/02/2009 |estreldate = 09/2009 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
